sections.content: Motivated third-year Computer Science student at CHI University with a strong academic foundation in programming languages including Java, C++, and Python. Experienced in data structures, SQL databases, Linux environments, and networking fundamentals (CCNA level). Demonstrates a keen interest in software development and a commitment to continuous learning through practical, real-world applications. Seeking an opportunity to apply and further develop technical skills in a professional environment, gain hands-on experience, and contribute effectively to collaborative team projects.

skills.items: Git, VS Code, penetration testing tools (Linux-based)

projects.title: Product Management System
projects.description: Developed a web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
details: Implemented full CRUD functionality (create, read, update, delete) with form validation.
Added automatic price calculation including taxes, ads, and discounts.
Integrated search functionality by product title or category.

courses: Completed multiple online courses covering various Computer Science topics.
Successfully completed a Python programming course and received a certificate.
Gained hands-on experience in penetration testing using Linux-based tools and environments.
Studied front-end web development technologies including HTML and CSS.
